description: Detects specific process parameters as used by Mustang Panda droppers
name: Mustang Panda Dropper
query: (process.command_line:(*Temp\\wtask.exe\ \/create* OR *%windir\:\~\-3,1%%PUBLIC\:\~\-9,1%* OR *\/tn\ \"Security\ Script\ * OR *%windir\:\~\-1,1%*) OR (process.command_line:*\/E\:vbscript* AND process.command_line:*C\:\\Users\\* AND process.command_line:*.txt* AND process.command_line:*\/F*) OR process.executable:*Temp\\winwsh.exe)
author: Florian Roth
oscd.community
